About

Hello! I am Hardik Nanda and this is my blog, where I would be writing about different topics related to Web Application Security and a “little” about Open Source Intelligence. As a context, I am a Noob and the articles that I am gonna publish would be very beginner friendly. My twitter indox would always be open for appreciation or criticism.

Thanks ❤️
